Html:
Hi there,

I'm just getting started with your library, and trying to replicate the code you posted in your user manual under the "Creating a graph" section. The code there calls a "MarkedEdge" class that doesn't seem to be defined in the source code you have provided. I do see it in the compiled assembly, however.

Is the source code you have provided the most recent version, or the compiled version? Why are they different? What else in the binary form is missing from the source code?

Thanks,

CVK

Seems like this class went missing in build 11810. I noticed also that GleeUtility referenced in the manual is now called GleeGraphUtility, and the .Execute() method of GleeGraphPopulator has been changed to Compute().

Having gotten it working, though, it looks like a pretty cool library/utility set. I'm looking forward to getting into more detail with it.
MarkedEdge got renamed to TaggedEdge, sorry about that.
